name: Distributed
description: Creates evenly distributed colors around the OKLCH hue wheel. Perfect for categorical data where each category needs a distinct, visually balanced color.

count.description: Number of colors to generate. Default is 6

lightness.description: Lightness for all colors (0-1). Default is 0.7

chroma.description: Chroma/saturation for all colors (0-0.4). Default is 0.15
